thread.title: Happy, enthusiastic customer
thread.title_full: Uncle Dan's reviewed by Happy, enthusiastic customer

author: Happy, enthusiastic customer
title: Happy, enthusiastic customer
text: I phoned in an order for a light winter jacket after our local shop was sold out. The pricing for the jacket as 25% less than the shop, and Dan's had the color I was looking for in my size. I asked to make sure it was still available, and she confirmed after a brief hold. Two days later, the jacket was on my doorstep. Great service, great pricing. Thanks.
